name: Kivi Kuvi
description:
"Kivi Kuvi" is a storybook style, light puzzle game about two owls finding a home with an emphasis on narrative and visual aspects.

Given the simplicity of the puzzles and its likeness to a story-book, my team and I intended "Kivi Kuvi" to be enjoyable by players of all ages - either children or adults who enjoy the nostalgia evoked by such a style.
